verses.verse: But the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4603>committed<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> in the accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%>: for <S%H5912>Achan<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3756>Carmi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2067>Zabdi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H3947>took<s%> of the accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%>: and the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> from <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%>, which is <S%H5973>beside<s%> <S%H1007>Beth<s%>–aven, on the east <S%H6924>side<s%> of <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el, and <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, Go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H7270>view<s%> the <S%H776>country<s%>. And the <S%H582>men<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H7270>viewed<s%> <S%H5857>Ai<s%>.

And they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5971>him<s%>, Let not all the people go <S%H5927>up<s%>; but let about two or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H5857>Ai<s%>; and make not all the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H3021>labor<s%> <S%H4592>there<s%>; for they are but few.

So there went <S%H5927>up<s%> there of the <S%H5971>people<s%> about <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>: and they <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> of them about <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>: for they <S%H7291>chased<s%> them from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> even unto <S%H7671>Shebarim<s%>, and <S%H5221>struck<s%> them in the going <S%H4174>down<s%>: why the <S%H3824>hearts<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4549>melted<s%>, and became as <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H8071>clothes<s%>, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> upon his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>, he and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H5927>put<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> upon their <S%H7218>heads<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H162>Alas<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, why have you at <S%H5674>all<s%> <S%H5674>brought<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, to <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H3863>us<s%>? Would to God we had been <S%H2974>content<s%>, and <S%H3427>lived<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>!
<S%H994>O<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%>, what shall I <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H310>when<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2015>turns<s%> their <S%H6203>backs<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%>!

For the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> of <S%H5437>it<s%>, and shall block us around, and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> our <S%H8034>name<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and what will you <S%H6213>do<s%> unto your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>?
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, Get you <S%H6965>up<s%>; why <S%H5307>lie<s%> you thus upon your <S%H6440>face<s%>?

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and they have also <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3947>them<s%>: for they have even taken of the accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%>, and have also <S%H1589>stolen<s%>, and <S%H3584>lied<s%> <S%H7760>also<s%>, and they have put it even among their own <S%H3627>stuff<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H6965>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, but <S%H6437>turned<s%> their <S%H6203>backs<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, because they were <S%H2764>accursed<s%>: neither will I be with you any <S%H3254>more<s%>, <S%H3808>except<s%> you <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H2764>accursed<s%> from among <S%H7130>you<s%>.

<S%H6965>Up<s%>, <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> yourselves against to <S%H4279>morrow<s%>: for thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, There is an accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of <S%H3478>you<s%>, O Israel: you <S%H3201>can<s%> not <S%H6965>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%>, until you take <S%H5493>away<s%> the accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%> from among <S%H7130>you<s%>.

In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> therefore you shall be <S%H7126>brought<s%> according to your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>: and it shall <S%H7626>be<s%>, that the tribe which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3920>takes<s%> shall <S%H7126>come<s%> according to the <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H4940>there<s%>; and the family which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H3920>take<s%> shall <S%H7126>come<s%> by <S%H1004>households<s%>; and the <S%H1004>household<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H3920>take<s%> shall <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> by <S%H1397>man<s%>.

And it shall <S%H3920>be<s%>, that he that is taken with the accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, he and all that he <S%H5674>has<s%>: because he has transgressed the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and because he has <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H5039>wickedness<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by their <S%H7626>tribes<s%>; and the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%>:

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; and he <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zarhites<s%>: and he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zarhites<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> by <S%H1397>man<s%>; and <S%H2067>Zabdi<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%>:

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> his <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> by <S%H1397>man<s%>; and <S%H5912>Achan<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3756>Carmi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2067>Zabdi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, was <S%H3920>taken<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5912>Achan<s%>, My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H7760>give<s%>, I pray <S%H3519>you<s%>, glory to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H8426>confession<s%> unto <S%H5046>him<s%>; and tell me now what you have <S%H6213>done<s%>; hide it not from <S%H3582>me<s%>.

And <S%H5912>Achan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H546>Indeed<s%> I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and thus and thus have I <S%H6213>done<s%>:

When I <S%H7200>saw<s%> among the <S%H7998>spoils<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8152>Babylonish<s%> <S%H155>garment<s%>, and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H3956>wedge<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> <S%H4948>weight<s%>, then I <S%H2530>coveted<s%> <S%H3947>them<s%>, and took <S%H2934>them<s%>; and, behold, they are hid in the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of my <S%H168>tent<s%>, and the silver under <S%H3701>it<s%>.

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%>, and they <S%H7323>ran<s%> unto the <S%H168>tent<s%>; <S%H2934>and<s%>, behold, it was hid in his <S%H168>tent<s%>, and the silver under <S%H3701>it<s%>.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> them out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and unto all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and laid them <S%H3332>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H3947>him<s%>, took <S%H5912>Achan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>, and the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H155>garment<s%>, and the <S%H3956>wedge<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and his <S%H7794>oxen<s%>, and his <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>, and his <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and his <S%H168>tent<s%>, and all that he <S%H5927>had<s%>: and they brought them unto the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you <S%H5916>troubled<s%> <S%H3068>us<s%>? the Lord shall <S%H5916>trouble<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>. And all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H8313>burned<s%> them with <S%H784>fire<s%>, after they had <S%H5619>stoned<s%> them with <S%H68>stones<s%>.

And they <S%H6965>raised<s%> over him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1530>heap<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>. So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> from the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%>. Why the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%>, The <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor<s%>, unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
